metadata.title: CVE-2023-23457 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A Segmentation fault was found in UPX in PackLinuxElf64::invert_pt_dynamic() in p_lx_elf.cpp. An attacker with a crafted input file allows invalid memory address access that could lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
